title: Disease library guide
text: mortality data set contains information mortality rate across diseases countries 1990 2019. variables provided dataset following country: Country name code: Country code (Alpha-3 code) continent: Continent country year: Year disease: Disease name mortality_rate: Mortality rate percentage Since country, year, disease information available. package provided function see available dataset. can using country_list(), year_list(), disease_list year_list() function, need provided country see year available.
code: mortality[1:10,] #>        country code continent year                                    disease #> 1  Afghanistan  AFG      Asia 1990                    Cardiovascular diseases #> 2 what: Top 10 higest mortality rate in the Australia for 2019
title: Disease library guide
text: two main types disease, Non-communicable Communicable diseases. Non-communicable diseases (NCDs) disease can passed person person, communicable diseases can spread person person. Now let’s see types diseases 2019 deadly world. look top ten diseases Australia 2019 using function dis_summary() dataframe, can see diseases highest mortality rate Australia Neoplasms, Cardiovascular diseases. two diseases NCD, shows impact NCDs larger currently portrayed society nowadays.
code: dis_summary("Australia", 2019) #> # A tibble: 10 × 3 #>     Rank disease                                    Mortality_rate #>    <dbl> <chr>                                               <dbl> #>  1     1 Neoplasms                                           31.4  #>  2     2 Cardiovascular diseases                             30.2  #>  3     3 Alzheimer's disease and other dementias              6.58 #>  4     4 Chronic respiratory diseases                         6.56 #>  5     5 Digestive diseases                                   3.88 #>  6     6 Chronic kidney disease                               3.05 #>  7     7 Lower respiratory infections                         2.50 #>  8     8 Diabetes mellitus                                    2.48 #>  9     9 Parkinson's disease                                  1.41 #> 10    10 Cirrhosis and other chronic liver diseases           1.30

what: Impact of the Neoplasms diseases overtime in Australia
title: Disease library guide
text: can analyze impact Neoplasms disease overtime using function plot_dis().  can see trends increase time, concerning shows enough effort put developing treatment needed diseases.

title: Give insight about the diseases
text: “dislib” disease library package provide information diseases mortality rate. original data world Data.

title: Give insight about the diseases
text: can install development version dislib GitHub :

title: Give insight about the diseases
text: mortality rate overtime Cardiovascular diseases Australia:  diseases highest mortality rate Australia 2019:
code: library(dislib) plot_dis("Cardiovascular diseases", "Australia") dis_summary("Australia", 2019) #> # A tibble: 10 × 3 #>     Rank disease                                    Mortality_rate #>    <dbl> <chr>                                               <dbl> #>  1     1 Neoplasms                                           31.4  #>  2     2 Cardiovascular diseases                             30.2  #>  3     3 Alzheimer's disease and other dementias              6.58 #>  4     4 Chronic respiratory diseases                         6.56 #>  5     5 Digestive diseases                                   3.88 #>  6     6 Chronic kidney disease                               3.05 #>  7     7 Lower respiratory infections                         2.50 #>  8     8 Diabetes mellitus                                    2.48 #>  9     9 Parkinson's disease                                  1.41 #> 10    10 Cirrhosis and other chronic liver diseases           1.30

title: Country list — country_list
text: Get list available country name.

title: Disease summary — dis_summary
text: Rank highest mortality rate disease particular country year. list available country year refer back country_list(), year_list().

title: Disease summary — dis_summary
text: country character country name want learn diseases rank. See full list country country_list(). year numeric specific year interest. See full list year year_list().

title: Disease summary — dis_summary
text: data frame top 10 diseases mortality rate highest lowest.

title: Disease summary — dis_summary
code: dis_summary(country = "Australia", year = 2019) #> # A tibble: 10 × 3 #>     Rank disease                                    Mortality_rate #>    <dbl> <chr>                                               <dbl> #>  1     1 Neoplasms                                           31.4  #>  2     2 Cardiovascular diseases                             30.2  #>  3     3 Alzheimer's disease and other dementias              6.58 #>  4     4 Chronic respiratory diseases                         6.56 #>  5     5 Digestive diseases                                   3.88 #>  6     6 Chronic kidney disease                               3.05 #>  7     7 Lower respiratory infections                         2.50 #>  8     8 Diabetes mellitus                                    2.48 #>  9     9 Parkinson's disease                                  1.41 #> 10    10 Cirrhosis and other chronic liver diseases           1.30

title: Global Mortality by diseases — mortality
text: mortality data set contains information mortality rate across diseases countries 1990 2019.

title: Global Mortality by diseases — mortality
text: data frame 128,520 rows 6 variables. country Country naem code Country code (Alpha-3 code) continent Continent country year Year disease Disease name mortality_rate Mortality rate percentage

title: Global Mortality by diseases — mortality
text: dataset following; world Data https://ourworldindata.org/causes--death https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lukes/ISO-3166-Countries--Regional-Codes/master//.csv. dataset includes causes death related disease information. entity continents income levels original dataset removed.

title: Mortality rate overtime — plot_dis
text: function plot mortality rate overtime disease country chosen. list available disease country refer back disease_list(), country_list().

title: Mortality rate overtime — plot_dis
text: disease character disease name want see. See full list disease disease_list(). country character country name want learn. See full list country country_list().

title: Mortality rate overtime — plot_dis
text: Return ggplot object.

text: function used called shiny app based provided dataset mortality.

title: Launch a shiny app — run_app
text: Shiny app.

text: Get list available year country specified.

text: country character country name want learn diseases rank. See full list country country_list().

text: vector available year data particular country.
